lexUnit.name: renounce.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: formally declare one's abandonment of (a claim, right, or possession).

sentence.text: Edward in return undertook to renounce his claim to the French throne .

SRI LANKA 'S Tamil Tiger guerrillas announced yesterday that they had renounced violence and registered as a political party .
